title: Adventure Male 01 Modular
description: Modular character kit containing a few options which can be arranged in various configurations. Fully compatible with other packs from the series which have Character Builder Component shipped within the pack
longDescription:
Requirements:

  • Skeletal Merging plugin needs to be enabled, otherwise won't compile
  • Add ProjectTags data table as GameplayTag source in the project settings. Can be found at: /Content/*ProjectName*/CharacterBuilderComponent/Blueprints
  • Custom Depth with Stencil needs to be enabled for preview scene to show up with no visual defects


Demo Video | Orbital Link | Version Changelog and Roadmap | Setup Video Guide

Current version - 0.11A


This is a standalone character which is split into parts and contains a few alternative options and materials.

The pack has Character Builder Component included, a system which assembles a character out of parts procedurally and enables seamless compatibility between multiple packs of this series.


Documentation is in the blueprint comments for now, see comments in the blueprints and example use cases.


The face has ARkit supported blendshapes and an example blinking animation.

The skeleton is based on UE5_Manny model and shares 1:1 proportions to it.

Future packs from this line will have completely interchangeable and seamlessly working together parts, including textures for body/face.


If you have any questions, feedback or wanna see upcoming packs or read guides, or ask questions, please join Discord


Changelog:

July 4, 2024 - 0.10A Initial release

July 20, 2024 - 0.11A Update (updated framework only)
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  Character Builder Component included
  •  2 prebuilt characters
  •  Animation dynamics for bag
  • ARKit support
  • Preview scene with full feature customization setup


Rigged: Yes

Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes

If rigged to the Epic skeleton, IK bones are included: Yes

Animated: Yes

Number of Animations: Demo Only

Animation types (Root Motion/In-place): In-place

Number of characters: 2 pre-built characters, 18 parts total

Vertex counts of characters: ~23 000-29000

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 26

Number of Textures: 66

Texture Resolutions: 1k, 2k, 4k

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: See the blueprint comments

Important/Additional Notes:

  • Custom Depth - Stencil Pass needs to have "Enabled with Stencil"
  • Skeletal Merging plugin needs to be enabled, otherwise won't compile
  • Add ProjectTags data table as GameplayTag source in the project settings. Can be found at: /Content/*ProjectName*/CharacterBuilderComponent/Blueprints


Character includes additional bones:

  • FaceJoint_M at head
  • EyeJoint_R and EyeJoint_L at FaceJoint_M
  • Bag and holster bones

List of parts:

  • 2 heads plus 5 pieces of split body
  • 1 boots mesh
  • 1 dufflebag mesh
  • 1 glasses mesh
  • 1 gloves mesh
  • 1 pants mesh (with alternative compatibility edit)
  • 1 pistol rig mesh (with alternative compatibility edit)
  • 1 sweater mesh (with alternative compatibility edit)
